title: Create a lib to generate sources from an OpenAPI specification file

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

useDockerBuild.description: Should the build occur inside of a docker container
useDockerBuild.x-prompt: Should the build occur inside of a docker container?

dockerImage.description: Which docker image should be used for the build
dockerImage.x-prompt: Which docker image should be used for the build?

generator.description: The generator this lib will use to build an API SDK (e.g.: typescript-fetch)
generator.x-prompt: Which OpenAPITool generator would you like to use? (https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator)

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like @myorg/my-awesome-lib

isRemoteSpec.x-prompt: Is the API spec file published online?

sourceSpecUrl.description: The URL of the remote API spec file (Ex: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/swagger.json)
sourceSpecUrl.x-prompt: If it's online, what's the URL where I can get the API spec file from?

sourceSpecUrlAuthorizationHeaders.description: A URL-encoded string of name:header with a comma separating multiple values
sourceSpecUrlAuthorizationHeaders.x-prompt: If it's online, which authorization headers do you need to add?

sourceSpecLib.description: The workspace lib where the source OpenAPI spec file is located at (Ex: api-spec)
sourceSpecLib.x-prompt: If it's local, what's the name of the lib containing the API spec file?

sourceSpecFileRelativePath.description: The name of the source OpenAPI spec file, and its path relative to the root of the `sourceSpecLib` project (Ex: src/api-spec.openapi.yml)
sourceSpecFileRelativePath.x-prompt: If it's local, what's the path of the API spec file starting from the lib root?

additionalProperties.x-prompt: Do you want to specify any additional properties for the generator? key1=value1,key2=value2 (https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/generators)

globalProperties.x-prompt: Do you want to specify any global properties for the generator? key1=value1,key2=value2 (https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/globals)
